title: FS/FT: Higher SGC graded EPDG commons and others - ALL SOLD

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Higher SGC graded EPDG commons and others - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have higher grade dupes available for sale. Will consider trades for comparable graded EPDGs I need. 

Links above each picture is for higher resolution scan.

$SOLD Peaches Graham EPDG 80 - Highest graded both pop reports
$SOLD Murray Portrait EPDG SGC 70 - Highest SGC graded. One PSA 6
$SOLD Meyers Portrait EPDG SGC 60 - Tied highest SGC graded. One PSA 6 with qualifier
$SOLD Seymour Throwing SGC 60 

REMOVED SOLD CARDS

Last one left!  Super tough Graham card that is highest graded.....
